title: Eliminate the X Variable
text: To eliminate $$x$$, multiply the first equation by $$-2$$ and add the result to the third equation. We get $$-y+3z=-4$$. If we add this to the second equation, we get $$0=-3$$, which is false. So, the system is inconsistent.
